mapper.select: select ssfs.id, ssfs.setting_type, sc.name settingTypeName, ssfs.proportion, ssfs.is_locked, ssfs.remark, ssfs.is_deleted, ssfs.created_by, ssfs.created_time, ssfs.modified_by, ssfs.modified_time from sys_service_fee_setting ssfs left join sys_code sc on ssfs.setting_type = sc.value and sc.is_deleted = 0 where ssfs.id = #{id} and ssfs.is_deleted = 0
